events.message: I placed an order two weeks ago and received the wrong item. I want to return it and get my money back as soon as possible.
The issue has been categorized under Refund due to the customer's request for a return and refund.
An agent has been assigned to assist with the customer's refund request regarding the incorrect order.
Hello! I'm here to help resolve the issue with your incorrect order and assist you with the refund process.
Could you please provide the order number and a photo of the item you received, so we can process your refund?
Sure, the order number is 123456789 and I have attached a photo showing the incorrect product I received.
Thank you for the information. We will initiate a return shipping label for you and refund the full purchase amount once we receive the item.
That sounds great, thank you for handling this quickly. I will send the package back as soon as I get the label.
We have received your returned item and processed the full refund to your original payment method.
Just following up to confirm that you have received the refund and that everything is satisfactory with your order.
Closing the case now. Please contact us anytime if you need further assistance or have any other concerns.
We have sent a satisfaction survey to your email. We appreciate your feedback to improve our support.
